page.title: 19Domesday Report
page.content: On Monday morning we had just started to do our domesday project. In the morning we watched a programme called{ {Domesday project.}On Monday afternoon we went for a 6 mile walk. We went to the bottom half of our D block and two other girls are helping us. When we went for a walk I went with Marie Pitt.We went through many puddles which I did not like. On Tuesday we went to Brownsover. On Wednesday we went to Lower Lodge Farm and passed Brownsover Hall. Marie and I thought it was spooky. We sat on the gate and looked at the horses for 5 or 10 minutes and set off back to school.I think the domesday project is good. Marie and myself went to do a report on housing. We managed to get 6 people to answer our questions.
